title: Langbot
description: I'm currently a senior full stack engineer building Langbot's EdTech Platform. Langbot is a platform where educators can create immersive courses to be administrated over facebook messenger to a page's following.

title: Zena
description: Zena is a cross platform Ethiopian news aggregator app.

title: Tenegna
description: Tenegna is a cross platform mobile app for publishing amharic news articles

title: AhadooCollect
description: Built the frontend for AhadooCollect(a survey creation and data collection platform similar to KoBoToolbox)

title: Dallol
description: Dallol is an Ethiopian news and video aggregator app built for android
